title.rendered: Eldorado Stone featured twice in Hearth and Home

content.rendered: Written for affluent homeowners that are interested in the hearth, barbecue or patio furnishing industries, Hearth and Home features Eldorado Stone in two installation shots within the August 2015 issue. Under the “Outdoor Room Design Ideas” section, the images display the beautiful stone. The features can be found on page 45 and 58.
